entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
